attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For all to £12k pa for all, permitting married couples to earn a maximum of £24k pa, the starting rate for income tax would then be 25% of earnt in excess of the threshold up to £80k/pa after that the rate should increase to a percentage sufficient to make up the short fall (if any) for income in excess of the £60K pa. This would permit all persons to earn a maximum of £12k pa without income tax, National Insurance Contributions should remain at their current level.
Each year for the next ten the tax free amount should increase by a percentage equivalent to true inflation.
